mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(SCHEDULE_NO, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_CONTENTS, SCHEDULE_START_DATE, SCHEDULE_END_DATE, SCHEDULE_COLOR) VALUES(schedule_seq.nextVal, #{scheduleTitle:VARCHAR}, #{scheduleContents:VARCHAR}, TO_DATE(#{scheduleStartDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{scheduleEndDate},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{scheduleColor:VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no, schedule_title, schedule_contents, schedule_start_date, schedule_end_date, schedule_color FROM schedule
